someone who makes a determined effort to achieve or stop something because of their strong beliefs: He caught the public imagination as a crusader against corruption. Synonyms
campaigner
fighter (PERSON)
(also Crusader) a Christian who fought in one of the religious wars of the 11th, 12th, 13th, and 17th centuries, mostly against Muslims in Palestine
